mapper.select: select tc.*,ty.id yearid,ty.year,gdp.*,gdp.id gdpId from t_country tc LEFT JOIN t_gdp gdp on tc.id=gdp.countryId LEFT JOIN t_year ty on ty.id=gdp.yearId ORDER BY ty.year,tc.id
select tc.*,ty.id yearid,ty.year,gdp.*,gdp.id gdpId from t_country tc LEFT JOIN t_gdp gdp on tc.id=gdp.contryId LEFT JOIN t_year ty on ty.id=gdp.yearId WHERE tc.id=#{id} ORDER BY ty.year
